title: Thatâ€™s Why You Go
lyrics:
[intro] | (Am)  (D) | (G)  (Em) | (Am)  (D) | (G)  (G) |
 
(Am)Baby won't you tell me (D)why there is (G)sadness in your eyes
(Am)I don't wanna say good(B7)bye to you (Em)
(Am)Love is one big il-(D)-lusion I should try to for(G)get
But (Am)there is something (D)left in my (G)head
 
(Am)You're the one who set it (D)up now (G)you're the one to make it stop
(Am)I'm the one who's feeling (B7)lost right now (Em)
(Am)Now you want me to for(D)get every little thing you (G)said
But (Am)there is something (D)left in my (G)head
 
[chorus]
(G)I won't for(C)get the (D)way you're (G)kissing
The feeling's so (Am)strong we're (D)lasting for so (G) long
But (G)I'm not the (C)man your (D)heart is (Em)missing
That's why you (Am)go (D)away I (G)know
 
(Am)You were never satis(D)fied (G) no matter how I tried
(Am)Now you wanna say good(B7)bye to me (Em)
(Am)Love is one big il-(D)-lusion I should try to for(G)get
But (Am)there is something (D)left in my (G)head
 
[chorus]
(G)I won't for(C)get the (D)way you're (G)kissing
The feeling's so (Am)strong we're (D)lasting for so (G) long
But (G)I'm not the (C)man your (D)heart is (Em)missing
That's why you (Am)go (D)away I (G)know
 
(Cm)Sitting here all (F)alone is the middle of (Bb)nowhere
(Am) Don't know which (D)way to go (Gm)
There (Cm)ain't so much to (F)say now be(Bb)tween us
There (Am)ain't so much for you (D)
There (Gm)ain't so much for (Cm) me any(F)more
 
[solo] | (Am)  (D) | (G)  (Em) | (Am)  (D) | (G)  (G) |
 
[chorus]
(G)I won't for(C)get the (D)way you're (G)kissing
The feeling's so (Am)strong we're (D)lasting for so (G) long
But (G)I'm not the (C)man your (D)heart is (Em)missing
That's why you (Am)go (D)away I (G)know
 
That's why you (Am)go (D)away I (G-tremolo)know [end]
